instanceType.description: AWS EC2 instance type for Validators and Rpc (t2.micro, t2.large, t2.xlarge)

networkName.description: Chain network name displayed in telemetry

networkId.description: Id used as chain-id and protocol-id in chainsepc config

initialBalancesFile.description: HTTP Link to the Initial Balances file

runtimeProfile.description: STAGING | PLAYGROUND | TESTING | FAST-PROD (leave empty for production)
